subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Christian Gomez scored on a penalty kick and the Colorado Rapids beat David Beckham and the Los Angeles Galaxy, 4-0, in Commerce, Colo., on a day when Major League Soccer opened its season. Beckham flew back from Europe after playing for England against France on Wednesday.
